check: Unfortunately we couldn't catch the exact error. If you want to help, please click on the button below to copy the failed command to the clipboard, paste it into the Terminal and submit command output to the developers

dashboard.title: 仪表板

backup.title: 备份
backup.name: 名称
backup.format_warning: All data in the disk will be erased, cannot be undone.
backup.no_data_backup_found_desc: There are no data backups. Click Create to configure the first backup
backup.wizard_choose_when_title: Choose when to run the backup
backup.wizard_choose_where_title: Choose where to save the backup
backup.wizard_choose_how_title: Choose the engine for the backup
backup.password_is_the_key: SFTP use the SSH key. Click to change password
backup.overwrite_all_data: the restore will overwrite all data
backup.nfs_rsync_info: Make sure the NFS server supports hard links, otherwise the backup will fail
backup.during_remap_warning: During interface remapping, if one or more interfaces change its IP address, you have to login again in the new IP address
backup.register_before_restore: You are trying to restore a backup with a subscription. Please register the machine before restoring this backup
backup.remap_at_least_one_green: You have to select at least one green to remap
backup.skip_network_info: Current network configuration will be preserved, but some applications may be disabled at the end of the process. After restoring, review the system configuration to re-enable all required applications.
backup.format_disk_message: Formatting will erase all data on this disk
backup.PasswordEncryptCreatedAfterSaved: Encryption secret will be generated at the end of the wizard. To show it, click on the 'Show restic secret' button.
backup.PasswordEncryptWarning: The data saved inside the destination storage are encrypted using the 'Encryption secret' above. Please store the secret on a safe place. Without this secret, you will not be able restore the data backup.

certificates.set_default_modal_message: Do you want to set {0} as default certificate?
certificates.deletion_error: The certificate has not been deleted

users_groups.title: 用户 & 群组
users_groups.ns6_ad_upgrade_messagetext: The local LDAP accounts provider can be upgraded to Samba Active Directory
users_groups.LocalLdapUpgrade_message1: This operation is not reversible! The LDAP database can be upgraded to a local Active Directory accounts provider.
users_groups.LocalLdapUpgrade_PDC_message1: Users, passwords, groups and computer accounts are preserved. Shared folder connections may require different credentials!
users_groups.LocalLdapUpgrade_WS_message1: Users, passwords and groups are preserved; however shared folder connections require different credentials!
users_groups.LocalLdapUpgrade_PDC_message2: When connecting to a shared folder, the NetBIOS domain name must be either prefixed to the user name (i.e. "MYDOMAIN\username"), or inserted in the specific form field.
users_groups.ns6upgrade_event_ok: The account provider is now Active Directory.
users_groups.ns6upgrade_event_error: An unexpected error has occurred. See the logs for details.
users_groups.warning_provider: To change the Account provider, the current provider has to be removed
users_groups.name: 名称
users_groups.description_provider: Users and groups are available through an account provider. You can connect this server to a remote account provider, or install a local one. Some features may be available depending on the account provider.
users_groups.description_provider_2: 简单配置，不支持使用共享目录
users_groups.description_provider_3: 允许所有共享目录特性，必须设置高级选项
users_groups.description_provider_4: Download and configure OpenLDAP server as a local LDAP account provider
users_groups.ldap_description: An LDAP database can store users, groups and passwords. It is required a RFC2307 compatible LDAP schema
users_groups.dc_description: Computers in an Active Directory domain can be simple members or domain controllers (DC)
users_groups.ip_warning_message_1: The chosen IP address must satisfy all of the following conditions
users_groups.ip_warning_message_2: The IP address must be in the same subnet range of a green network: e.g.
users_groups.ip_warning_message_3: The IP address must be unused currently
users_groups.remote_ad_installed_ok: 远程活动目录加入成功!
users_groups.local_ad_installed_ok: 本地活动目录安装成功!
users_groups.define_authorization: Define the authorizations for this group.
users_groups.define_authorization_description: Select the System views and Applications that members of this group can manage.
users_groups.auth_required: Bind credentials are required for external applications
users_groups.no_users_found_desc: If your provider is local, click on button below to create a new user or add it on remote provider
users_groups.no_groups_found_desc: If your provider is local, click on button below to create a new group or add it on remote provider
users_groups.weak_password: Your policy allows you to insert weak password, it not recommended for security reasons

network.traceroute_info: Show the route to a host

settings.title: 设置
settings.remote_account_provider_password: The currently logged in user is member of the remote account provider
settings.otp_Step1_Download_FreeOTP: 1. Download your preferred 2FA application to your phone. If you do not have one, FreeOTP is the recommended one
settings.otp_Step2_scan_with_FreeOTP: 2. Scan the QR code with your phone using the 2FA application
settings.otp_Step3_Validate_the_X-digit_code: 3. Enter the 6-digit code provided by your application and click on 'Check code' button. If the verification code is valid, choose the services to protect.
settings.grant_only_trusted_networks: Grant access only from Trusted Networks
settings.cockpit_will_be_restared: Cockpit Server Manager will be restarted
settings.user_settings_can_be_accessed_by_these_u: When enabled, user settings page can be accessed by these URLs
settings.user_settings_page_urls_explain: These URLs are obtained by server aliases and IP addresses on green and red interfaces.

about.title: 关于
about.description_2: NethServer is an operating system for Linux enthusiasts, designed for small offices and medium enterprises.
about.phonehome: Phone home is used to track all NethServer installations around the world.

applications.title: 应用程序
applications.name: 名称
applications.remove_applications_warn: This action will remove these packages

software_center.title: Software Center
software_center.install_ok: Applications installed successfully! Go to Applications page to configure them.
software_center.install_ok_s: Application installed successfully! Go to Applications page to configure it.
software_center.permission_denied: You don't have permissions to view this page
software_center.nethserver_upgrade_message:
A system upgrade for NethServer is available. 
The system upgrade procedure enables the new version repositories and updates any installed package

subscription.title: Subscription
subscription.registration_description: The NethServer Subscription by Nethesis enables exclusive access to the Stable Updates repository, monitoring tools and immediate professional support services for your NethServer deployments. It enables you to successfully deploy, monitor and manage your NethServer instances, complementing your IT resources and increasing the efficiency and reliability of your services
subscription.registration_description_2: Do you already have an authorization token? Copy and paste it in the field below
subscription.registration_description_ent: Register the server to access software repositories, support services and enable monitoring tools
subscription.registration_description_2_ent: Do you already have an authorization token? Copy and paste it in the field below
subscription.registration_description_ent_partial: This machine has been registered successfully, but to unlock additional functionalities insert the authorization token
subscription.registration_description_2_ent_partial: You can find the authorization token in the server detail page in the cloud portal
subscription.remove_subscription_warn: This action will disconnect this system from the cloud portal
subscription.remove_subscription_warn_ent: This action will disconnect this system from the cloud portal

hints.change_default_policy: The default policy may use weak encryption protocols and ciphers
hints.one_or_more_dns_not_working: One or more DNS servers are not responding
hints.service_is_enabled_but_is_not_running: The service is either not running or not enabled
hints.must_configure_backup_data: You should configure at least one data backup
hints.change_default_ssh_port: Change the default SSH port to lower brute force attack rates
hints.limit_red_access_by_ip: Limit access to server manager specifying the allowed IP addresses
hints.interface_must_be_static: A green interface must have a static IP address. Using DHCP on green interfaces leads to unexpected behavior. Please, change the interface to static if possible.
hints.support_active: A remote support session is active
hints.hostname_should_be_third_level_domain: The hostname must have a second level domain suffix, like "host.example.com"
hints.first_hostname_part_maximum_length_15: First hostname part must be maximum 15 characters lenght
hints.unmapped_interface_from_restore: This interface has not been activated after the restore. Assign the role to a new interface or remove it
hints.network_recovery_mode: The system is configured with a temporary IP address by the network-recovery tool: any change to this page will restore the network configuration as set below.

validation.ip_address_or_cidr: The value must be a valid IP like '10.0.0.1' or CIDR like '10.0.0.1/24'
validation.ip_address_network_or_broadcast: IP address can't be the network or broadcast address
validation.this_network_overlaps_with_another_one: This network overlaps with an existing one
validation.valid_date_YYYY-mm-dd: The date format must be YYYY-mm-dd
validation.valid_time: The time must be in the form HH:mm

validation.valid_username: First character must be a letter, than only lower letters, numbers and symbols like '-' and '_'

validation.b2_delete_failed: Can't delete files from the bucket

validation.cifs_unauthorized: CIFS server is unreachable or credentials are not valid, also make sure the target directory is writable

validation.usb_delete_failed: Can't delete files from the disk
validation.valid_cidrBlock: Must be a valid CIDR network

validation.valid_macAddress: Must be a valid MAC address

docs.sftp_password: The password will not be saved. SSH connection will use a RSA key.
docs.smb_login: If the target server is joined to a domain, use extended syntax like 'MyBindUser,domain=mydomain.com'.
docs.vol_size: Size of backup chunks in MB, keep small if the backup destination is a remote server. Default is 200MB.
docs.dns_wildcard: If enabled, match also all sub-domains.
docs.limit_access: Restrict access to port 9090 only to given IP addresses. For a more granular access control, use the firewall rules.
docs.dhcp_comma_separated_field: Insert an IP address or a comma-separated list of IP addesses
docs.remote_shell: Enable this option to grant access to the Terminal and the Server Manager.
docs.list_of_ports: Enter one or more port numbers separated by a comma, e.g.: '8081, 9292'
docs.AllowGroupsToSSH_SFTP: Select one or more groups to grant SSH and/or SFTP access. Administrators are always granted SSH and SFTP access. The root account is still subject to the "Allow root login" checkbox setting.
docs.ssh_everyone_info: Set the basic permission for non administrative accounts.
docs.ssh_administrators_info: Administrators are always granted SSH and SFTP access.
docs.shell_bash_needed: Once enabled, the Shell setting returned by the account provider is ignored. As a consequence, non-admin users must be granted again SSH and SFTP access permissions.
docs.otp_enable: Add a second factor of authentication based on time. To access the Server Manger you will have to enter also a temporary token generated by an application installed on your phone.
docs.otp_Scan_QRcode: The QR code contains a secret URL used to generate valid tokens.
docs.otp_code_for_single_use: If you lose your phone, you can use backup codes to sign in. Every backup code can be used only once.
docs.OtpSshd_Only_Password_Auth: 2FA is available only for password authentication. Authentication with public keys will not be affected by 2FA.
docs.user_settings_page: Allow users to change their password and other settings on a web page outside Cockpit (on port 443). This feature can be enabled only if 'Override the shell of users' is enabled as well.
docs.OtpR2WOath_Auth: The VPN policy requires the usage of OTP to access the network.
docs.older_ssh_client_might_not_connect: Hardening SSH could prevent old clients to connect to the server. Big files transfer can be slower with strong ciphers. The host key will change after restart and clients will have to accept it again.
